question: In which Cricket World Cup edition, India won its first "Cricket World Cup Champion" title?
explanation: In the 3rd Cricket World Cup edition, India won its first "Cricket World Cup Champion" title. The 1983 Cricket World Cup (officially the Prudential Cup '83) was the 3rd edition of the Cricket World Cup tournament. It was held from 9 to 25 June 1983 in England and Wales and was won by India.
